package.name: xpressbuy_product_variants
package.summary:
With Xpressbuy ProductVariants retailers can present customers with related products or variants of the current product selected by customer.
XpressBuy is a service that allows a retailer to drive in-the-moment purchases of their products. Anywhere a user engages with their brand, shoppers will be able to make purchases without having to go to the retailer’s site. XpressBuy works across all platforms (mobile and desktop), social networks (including Facebook and Twitter), within Apps, within e-mails, and in all types of Advertising (native ads, banner, video, etc.). Allowing buying “in-the-moment” drives higher conversion rates and, thus, higher ROI. Keeping the user “in-the-moment” while simultaneously lowering barriers to purchase (such as automatically retrieving address information from the user’s mobile carrier), drives conversion rates higher by 2X to 6X and drives up average order value by up to 74%.
package.description:
XpressBuy Product Variants
With Xpressbuy ProductVariants retailers can present customers with related products or variants of the current product selected by customer.
XpressBuy is a service that allows a retailer to drive in-the-moment purchases of their products. Anywhere a user engages with their brand, shoppers will be able to make purchases without having to go to the retailer’s site. XpressBuy works across all platforms (mobile and desktop), social networks (including Facebook and Twitter), within Apps, within e-mails, and in all types of Advertising (native ads, banner, video, etc.). Allowing buying “in-the-moment” drives higher conversion rates and, thus, higher ROI. Keeping the user “in-the-moment” while simultaneously lowering barriers to purchase (such as automatically retrieving address information from the user’s mobile carrier), drives conversion rates higher by 2X to 6X and drives up average order value by up to 74%.
Features
Product Data to XpressBuy Xpressbuy leverages the Magento’s Product API to retrieve product variants and related products. This information is displayed to the user to as part of XpressBuy checkout.
Basket Creation in Magento XpressBuy uses this extension to create orders that include shipping, billing, quantity and selected product variants (product id).
How it works
Xpressbuy retrieves product variants and related products Customer adds these products to cart Upon customer checkout Xpressbuy creates order with selected products and variants. Merchant Benefits
Related products: Showing related products to customer will reduce the customer burden to search for them.
Increased sales: Relevant products at correct time means more sales total.
Customer Benefits:
Choice: User will have choice to choose which product to buy(which color or size)
Smooth Add to Cart step: Customer's don't need to leave product information page in order to find related product. It makes it easy for customer to select product options (color, size etc.) during 'Add to Cart'.
